hero.title: Your Health Data, Your Control
hero.subtitle: A privacy-first, self-hosted platform for managing your medical records. No third parties. No cloud dependencies. Complete ownership.

features.title: Everything You Need for Health Data Management

centralized.title: Centralized Storage
centralized.description: All your medical analyses and documents in one secure place, accessible only by you.

historical.title: Historical Tracking
historical.description: Track your health indicators over time with clear visualizations and trend analysis.

pdf.title: PDF Extraction
pdf.description: Automatically extract and structure data from laboratory PDF reports.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Self-hosted solution with no data leaving your infrastructure. You own your data.

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Sign in to access your health data

register.title: Create your account
register.subtitle: Start managing your health data privately

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link
forgotPassword.success: If an account exists with that email, you'll receive a password reset link.

resetPassword.title: Set new password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below
resetPassword.success: Your password has been reset successfully.
resetPassword.invalidToken: This reset link is invalid or has expired.

errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 12 characters

accountSetup.title: Complete Your Profile
accountSetup.subtitle: Just a few more details to get you started

emptyState.title: Your health timeline starts here
emptyState.description: Upload your first lab report to begin tracking your health journey.

createReport.title: Create Diagnostic Report
createReport.description: Start a new diagnostic report with observations

viewReports.title: View All Reports
viewReports.description: Browse and manage your diagnostic reports

completeProfile.title: Complete Your Profile
completeProfile.description: Add more details to personalize your experience

addFamily.title: Add a Family Member
addFamily.description: Manage health data for your loved ones

exploreTimeline.title: Explore Your Timeline
exploreTimeline.description: View and analyze your health history

changeEmail.title: Change Email
changeEmail.description: Update the email address associated with your account

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.description: Update your password to keep your account secure

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.warning: Warning: This will permanently delete all your data, including all reports, family members, and settings.
deleteAccount.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.
